General.Name: Hangzhou Chinastars Reflective Material Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Chinastars New Materials Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells reflective fabrics and safety vests in China. It offers reflective materials, such as reflective fabrics for PPE, FR reflective tapes, heat transfer vinyl and logos, reflective ribbons and pipings, reflective yarns, and prismatic tapes; and outdoor reflective fabrics comprising reflective printing fabrics, color, silver, gradient, rainbow, and perforated reflective fabrics. The company also provides safety clothes, including safety vests, pants, raincoats, shirts and sweatshirts, and coveralls, as well as hi vis jackets; and reflective toys and other accessories. It exports its products to Europe, Canada, the United States, Australia, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
